content.question: Which of the following most likely explains why Nehru was attracted to the ideas of both Gandhi and Marx?

choices.label: Both were critical of colonial rule.
Both wanted greater government control over economic production.
Both advocated for nonviolent means of protest to achieve political aims.

content.answer: Both were critical of colonial rule.
